org.araneaframework.uilib.event
Class StandardControlEventListenerAdapter

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.uilib.event.StandardControlEventListenerAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, EventListener
public class StandardControlEventListenerAdapter
extends Object
implements EventListener

This class manages "onChange" and "onClick" events of Controls that support those types of events.

Extended support for all kinds of event listeners (CustomEventListener) in Aranea 2.0.

Author:
Jevgeni Kabanov (ekabanov@araneaframework.org), Martti Tamm (martti@araneaframework.org)
See Also:

addCustomEventListener

public void addCustomEventListener(String eventId,
                                   CustomEventListener customEventListener)
Adds a CustomEventListener, which is called when the event with given eventId is fired.

Parameters:
eventId - The name of the event that the given listener should be notified of.
customEventListener - The listener, which is called when the event is fired.

Returns:

processEvent

public void processEvent(String eventId,
                         InputData input)
                  throws Exception
Fires onChange, onClick, and custom event listeners, if they are in the request. When incoming event ID equals to or to and there are listeners registered for the same event among custom event listeners then the latter ones will also get called.

Specified by:
processEvent in interface EventListener
Parameters:
eventId - The name of the event for which listeners will be called.
input - The incoming request data..
Throws:
Exception - Any runtime exception that may occur.
